name: Overcooked! 2
description: A chaotic cooperative cooking game where players must work together to prepare, cook and serve up a variety of tasty orders.

name: Cooking Mama: Cookstar
description: A cooking simulation game where you follow Mama's instructions to create a variety of dishes.

name: Good Pizza, Great Pizza
description: A pizza-making simulation game where you must fulfill customer orders while managing your pizzeria.
